login.brandSubTitle: Secure login area for authorized users

forbidden.title: 403 - Unauthorized Access
forbidden.message: You do not have the required permissions to view this page. Try logging in with your account, switching to a role you are authorized for, or returning to the homepage.
forbidden.subMessage: If you believe you should have access, request a role/permission check from your administrator.

notFound.title: 404 – Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you’re looking for might have been moved, deleted, or never existed. Check the address or go back to the homepage.
notFound.subMessage: Use the navigation menu to find what you need or reach out to our support team.
